AWS here is the architecture of the SCP
abap assistant the first step is
authentication where the developer uses
AWS command line interface to
authenticate with the AWS am identity
Center in the Second Step the developer
installs the SCP abap assistant plugin
in eclipse and opens an abap program
from the SCP system already onboarded to
eclipse the developer either selects a
block of abap code to generate
documentation or writes prompt in simple
English for the code required and then
invokes the abap assistant plugin in
eclipse in the final step the SCP abap
assistant invokes the Amazon Bedrock
service to generate abap code and
documentation and displays the results
back in eclipse
